105  template <class filterArrayT>
106  bool add_point_filter(const plValues &point, filterArrayT filter, plFloat weight = PL_ONE)
107  {
108  point.to_data_values(all_vars_.get_variable_list(), &values_);
109  return addFilterPoint(values_, filter, weight);
110  }
111 
113  template <class arrayT, class filterArrayT>
114  bool add_point_filter(arrayT* point, filterArrayT filter, plFloat weight = PL_ONE)
115  {
116  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < values_.size(); i++){
117  values_[i] = point[i];
118  }
119  return addFilterPoint(values_, filter, weight);
120  }
121 
123  template <class arrayT, class filterArrayT>
124  bool add_point_filter(const std::vector <arrayT> &point, filterArrayT filter, plFloat weight = PL_ONE)
125  {
126  assert(values_.size() == point.size());
127  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < values_.size(); i++){
128  values_[i] = point[i];
129  }
130  return addFilterPoint(values_, filter, weight);
131  }
132 
135  template <class singleT, class filterArrayT>
136  bool add_point_filter(singleT point, filterArrayT filter, plFloat weight = PL_ONE)
137  {
138  assert(values_.size() == 1);
139  values_[0] = point;
140  return addFilterPoint(values_, filter, weight);
141  }

202  template <class filterArrayT>
203  bool addFilterPoint(const plDataValues &point, filterArrayT distrib_to_update, plFloat weight = PL_ONE)
204  {
205  unsigned int i, j;
206  bool res = true;
207 
208  nsamples_++;
209  total_weight_ += weight;
210 
211  for( i = 0; i < learn_objects_.size(); i++){
212 
213  if(distrib_to_update[i]){
214  for(j = 0; j < point_to_children_points_[i].size(); j++){
215  children_points_[i][j] = point[ point_to_children_points_[i][j] ];
216  }
217  res = res && learn_objects_[i]->internal_addPoint(children_points_[i], weight);
218  }
219  }
220 
221  return res;
222  }
223 
224  bool internal_addPointWithDef(const plDataValues &point,
225  const std::vector <bool> &is_defined,
226  plFloat weight = PL_ONE);
227

229

234  const plVariablesConjunction &vars,
235  bool clone_passed_learn_objects);
236 
237  virtual void Output(std::ostream &out) const;
238 
239  protected:
240  std::vector <plLearnObject*> learn_objects_;
241  std::vector <plDataValues> children_points_;
242  std::vector < std::vector < unsigned int> > point_to_children_points_;
243  plVariablesConjunction left_variables_;
244  plVariablesConjunction right_variables_;
245  bool delete_learn_objects_;
